data.message: CAN YOU PLEASE HELP ME GET MY VIDEOS TO WORK AGAIN? THE VISUAL ON ALL VIDEOS I TRY TO WATCH FROM FACEBOOK IS ALL CHOPPY!  I've written to support, but nothing has happened...

replies.message: Hi Bria. We're sorry to hear that your Facebook experience hasn't been an enjoyable one! There could be a few reasons why your videos aren't loading. To learn more, please visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1v6ZLW7. We hope this helps! -Rose

I have scoured the entire help center, but found nothing remotely like my problem.  The videos actually do load, and the audio is perfect, but the visual is really choppy ... it works fine if i expand the video to full screen, but it doenst work within my newsfeed...
Hello, can I ask Facebook what is the limit when It comes to merging pages? I would be really thankful for your answer and I am sorry for disturbing, have a nice day

Please someone help me my Granddaughters other acct was hacked last night SHE HAS BEEN MISSING 15 days, i took over the acct per police to be able to contact friends to help us find her. You can verify this as I sent faceook a request to change her birthdate so i could leave the acct OPEN PLEASE IM BEGGING SOMEONE HELP ME, WE NEED THAT ACCT. you can verify my story by looking at my cover page, PLEASE
Susan, you should call fb for help via her acct. posting here wont do anything.
Hi facebook.. pls help me... some people use my name and picture.. pls block that account..
That actually doesn't like a facebook problem, Actually sounds like a flash player issue.
How can we Verify Our Official Facebook Page? Please Tell Us?
